title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: UNI Falls 4.2% as Index Trades Lower From Monday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polkadot (DOT) joined Uniswap (UNI) as an underperformer, declining 4.1%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3366.83, down 0.8% (-28.06) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Three of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: ETH (+3.5%) and SUI (+0.9%).

Laggards: UNI (-4.2%) and DOT (-4.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading down 0.8% with only 3 of 20 assets gaining while UNI and DOT show significant declines of 4.2% and 4.1% respectively.
